channel.title: Compiler Error While trying to add Projectiles
channel.description:
Hey! I'm using HellzEnd source, and right now I'm trying to add projectiles by using this [url=http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=31117]tut[/url]
I have add the method and added the createprojectile to one of my bows... but now when I compile it says this:
[code]client.java:22524: cannot find symbol symbol : variable offsetX location: class client createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 85, 249, 43, 33, 0 - Attacki ngOn); ^ client.java:22524: cannot find symbol symbol : variable offsetY location: class client createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 85, 249, 43, 33, 0 - Attacki ngOn); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Any ideas? Please help, thanks.

item.title: Compiler Error While trying to add Projectiles
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Hey! I’m using HellzEnd source, and right now I’m trying to add projectiles by using this tut

I have add the method and added the createprojectile to one of my bows… but now when I compile it says this:
